bluetooth_adapter_missing_permissions.title: Bluetooth adapter requires additional permissions
bluetooth_adapter_missing_permissions.description:
The Bluetooth adapter **{adapter}** ({model}) is operating in degraded mode because your container needs additional permissions to fully access Bluetooth hardware.

Please follow the instructions in our documentation to add the required permissions:
[Bluetooth permissions for Docker]({docs_url})

After adding these permissions, restart your Home Assistant container for the changes to take effect.
